name: Station Escape 2
description: Use your xbox or ps4 controller or the keyboard (WASD and Arrows) to escape the space station.  Move with the left hand and shoot with the right.  To escape you must collect the trophy (you'll know it when you see it) but first you must escape from each of 11 rooms.  You need a key to get out of each room and you can get a key by destroying the lairs of all of the enemies in each room.  Try it and you'll get the hang of it quickly and have fun trying to get to the trophy at the end.
